text: The Pure Fusion Collective was an evil professional wrestling stable in WWE. They were a part of the Raw brand. The members of the group were Sonya Deville, Shayna Baszler, and Zoey Stark. On February 7, 2025, Deville's contract with WWE expired and she was removed from the Pure Fusion Collective. Baszler and Stark continued to wrestle as a tag team until May 2, when Baszler was released from her contract. Category:WWE teams and stables
title: The Pure Fusion Collective
